"Gingira Ginga" by Sutopuri
#2: "Daiuchū Rendezvous" (大宇宙ランデブー) by Sutopuri (eps 29-51)

#1: "Umarekawattemo" (生まれ変わっても) by Kana Nozomihara (CV: Kana Hanazawa) (ep 1)
#2: "Y Gakuen e Ikou Waiwai-hen" (Y学園へ行こう ワイワイ編) by Lon (eps 2, 6, 11, 17, 22, 28, 33)
#3: "Y Gakuen e Ikou Shissou-hen" (Y学園へ行こう 疾走編) by 96Neko (eps 3, 7, 12, 18, 23, 29, 36)
#4: "Y Gakuen e Ikou Seishun Rock-hen" (Y学園へ行こう 青春ロック編) by +α/Alfakyun (eps 4, 9, 13, 19, 26)
#5: "Y Gakuen e Ikou Gakuen Dotabata-hen" (Y学園へ行こう 学園ドタバタ編) by Riinu (Sutopuri) (eps 5, 10, 15, 21, 24, 30, 32)
#6: "Return to Chikyū" (リターントゥ地球) by Haruka Tomatsu (eps 8, 16, 25, 35, 38, 42-43, 45)
#7: "Y Gakuen e Ikou 8bit-hen" (Y学園へ行こう 8bit編) by Soraru (eps 14, 20, 27, 31)
#8: "Eruzemekia, the Invading Witch Girl" (侵略魔少女エルゼメキア) by Eruzemekia (CV: P Maru-sama.) (eps 34, 41, 44, 46)
#9: "Gingira Ginga" (ギンギラ銀河) by Sutopuri (eps 37, 52)
#10: "Anthem of the Republic of Shining Stars" (キラボシ共和国国歌) by Sona Yamamoto, Hana Kogane, Tamaki Kumata, Kenshin Kobayashi and Dazaifu Housewife Choir ODEN (eps 39-40)
#11: "Uchū Shinpi Boogie" (宇宙神秘ブギ) by Riinu (Sutopuri) (eps 47-51)
#12: "YSP!!" by King Cream Soda (eps 53-62)
#13: "Daiuchū Rendezvous" (大宇宙ランデブー) by Sutopuri (ep 63)
